Package io.atomix.core.set

Interface DistributedSet<E>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - set entry type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Collection<E>, DistributedCollection<E>, DistributedPrimitive, Iterable<E>, Set<E>, SyncIterable<E>, SyncPrimitive
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DistributedNavigableSet<E>, DistributedSortedSet<E>
    public interface DistributedSet<E>
extends DistributedCollection<E>, Set<E>
    A distributed collection designed for holding unique elements.
